intro.p: A professor wanted to learn more about the students at her university with regards to whether they prefer in-person or online classes. She received surveys from {{sample}} students in response to contacting {{population}} students at the university to ask them to complete the survey. Among these {{sample}} students, {{result}}% of them reported that they prefer taking online classes.

content.p: What is the population that this study is trying to get information about?

outtro.p: Students at the school where the professor works
The {{sample}} students that responded to the survey.

content.p: What is the variable used for this study?

outtro.p: The preference of a student for in-person or online classes.

content.p: What type of variable is the variable in question 3?
What is the sample statistic for this study?

outtro.p: The sample statistic is that {{result}}% of those polled prefer online classes.

content.p: What is the parameter of interest for this study? (the population parameter that the professor is trying to gather information about)

outtro.p: The parameter of interest is the percentage of students at her university that prefer online classes.
